text: Wow! Great to have this vegetarian store in Punggol. Lots of variety and choices. Good news for Punggolian & Sengkanger. They even have online catalogue.
Full range of Vegan food.  Reasonable price. Friendly owner, very convenient with parking space just behind the shop. Instant food also.

Love the curated items of vegetarian-friendly food items here. The environment is clean, spacious and comfortable. Items are meticulously organised. Great shopping experience for vegetarian groceries and snacks. Hope to see a branch in Yishun soon!

Great vegan grocery store with a wide selection of fresh and quality products. Everything is clearly labeled, making shopping easy. The staff is friendly and helpful, always ready to answer questions. The store is clean and organized, and I always feel confident buying here. Definitely recommend if you're looking for reliable vegan options!
Friendly staff, good service and you can find a good variety of vegetarian food here. Highly recommend.
